general_advisory: Make arrangement for supplemental irrigation in standing crops like Groundnut, Sunflower, Chick pea, Maize, Green gram etc. Farmers are advised to install “T” shaped bird perches in and around crop fields. Install pheromone traps and yellow sticky traps for monitoring insect populations. Apply recommended doses of fertilizers and pesticides correctly. Specific advisories for different crops are provided in the bulletin.
